summary: Liza's a nurse, seeking love. Her only company is a long-dead Japanese pop star, who turns her into a fox-fairy out of jealousy. Now, every men who desires Liza shall die horribly. Can she overcome the curse?
cast: Mónika Balsai|Szabolcs Bede Fazekas|David Sakurai|Zoltán Schmied|Antal Cserna|Piroska Molnár|Gábor Reviczky|Mariann Kocsis|Ági Gubík|Lehel Kovács|Zsuzsa Töreky|Vali Dániel|Mária Bókay|Gyözö Szabó|István Göz|István Hajdu|Klára Jarábik|Kata Bartsch|Rodrigo Crespo|János Bán|Sándor Szûcs|László Nádasi|Nóra Diána Takács|Dezsö Rancsó|Katalin Kiss Horváth|Orsolya Mihályi|Andrea Balázs|Zoltán Karácsonyi|Katalin Bene|Kata Losonczi|Gyöngy Bérces|Gábor Harsányi|Kata Purt
title: Un hada llamada Liza
